ShapelyChipDesigns.designs_poly module¶

ShapelyChipDesigns.designs_poly.MakeTransmissionLine(xvals, yvals, width, gap)¶
ShapelyChipDesigns.designs_poly.get_airbridge_poly1(width=36, length=16, spacing=34)¶

returns a Polylist Usage: RES.add_STRUC1(S1a+S1b)

ShapelyChipDesigns.designs_poly.get_airbridge_poly2(S2)¶
ShapelyChipDesigns.designs_poly.get_airbridge_polys(x, y, A10, A20, NA=10, res=1000.0)¶

x,y: coordinates along which to distribute the airbridges NA: number of airbridges A10, A20: Airbridge Polygons (A20 is the larger one), use

“get_airbridge_poly” to get the boxes

returns S1, S2 airbridge layers.

ShapelyChipDesigns.designs_poly.mybox((x00, y00), width, height)¶

Returns a rectangular polygon with the lower left edge at ‘x00, y00’ of width ‘width’ and height ‘height’.

ShapelyChipDesigns.designs_poly.text2poly(text, size, position=(0, 0), horizontal=True, angle=0, layer=None, datatype=None)¶

ShapelyChipDesigns.designs_poly.v_dotproduct(v1, v2)¶
